data.message:
Dear Facebook team, could you help me please getting my old account back, i've applied the form and still waiting for my case to be reviewed, I'd be really grateful if you reviewed my case :(

My case number #210478487

"Dear all, I'm still waiting for your response concerning my case, my account means a lot for me as I'm contacting many persons and most of my friends are there, as well as precious memories from 5 years since i joined facebook
So please review my case ASAP and reactivate my account, I've uploaded all my personal details and my national ID.

Thanks in advance"

replies.message: Hi Amr. We appreciate your patience as our team reviews your report. In the meantime, you may be able to track the status of your report in the Support Dashboard: http://on.fb.me/1yoXQhb  -Elissa
I review it everyday, i believe the request was 3 weeks ago, does it take that much ?
